paper_abstract: In this paper we consider the energy decay rates for viscoelastic wave equation with dynamic boundary conditions. Motivated by results of Gerbi and Said-Houari [7], Cavalcanti and Oquendo[11], Li and Zhao [12] and we intend to study the energy decay for problem (1.1). By using the perturbed energy method, we proved the general energy decay rate.
paper_title: ENERGY DECAY RATES FOR VISCOELASTIC WAVE EQUATION WITH DYNAMIC BOUNDARY CONDITIONS
